blocks.name: snct
blocks.content: A singleton is countable. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Sep-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm snct(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(csn(c0), cdom, com))
} = {
  sylancl(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(csn(c0), cdom, com), wbr(csn(c0), cen, c1o), wbr(c1o, cdom, com))
  ensn1g(c0, c1)
  mpbi(wbr(c1o, cdom, com), wbr(emptycls, csdm, com))
  mpbir(wbr(emptycls, csdm, com), wne(com, emptycls))
  ne0ii(com, emptycls)
  peano1()
  0sdom(com)
  omex()
  0sdom1dom(com)
  endomtr(csn(c0), c1o, com)
}

blocks.name: prct
blocks.content: An unordered pair is countable. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Sep-2016.)

blocks.name: mpt2cti
blocks.content: An operation is countable if both its domains are countable. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Sep-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm mpt2cti(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wbr(c1, cdom, com)), wbr(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), cdom, com))
  -| wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wcel(c2, c3)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  sylancr(wa(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wbr(c1, cdom, com)), wbr(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), cdom, com), wfn(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), cxp(c0, c1)), wbr(cxp(c0, c1), cdom, com))
  ax-mp(wfn(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), cxp(c0, c1)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wcel(c2, c3))))
  fnmpt2(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2))
  eqid(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2))
  xpct(c0, c1)
  fnct(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), cxp(c0, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mpt2cti(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0[‚âº]_om ‚àß c1[‚âº]_om)‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c0, s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2)[‚âº]_om)
  ‚ä£ ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  sylancr((c0[‚âº]_om ‚àß c1[‚âº]_om), (s0 ‚àà c0, s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2)[‚âº]_om, (s0 ‚àà c0, s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2)[Fn](c0 √ó c1), (c0 √ó c1)[‚âº]_om)
  ax-mp((s0 ‚àà c0, s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2)[Fn](c0 √ó c1), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3)))
  fnmpt2(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, (s0 ‚àà c0, s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2))
  eqid((s0 ‚àà c0, s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2))
  xpct(c0, c1)
  fnct((s0 ‚àà c0, s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2), (c0 √ó c1))
}

blocks.name: abrexct
blocks.content: An image set of a countable set is countable. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 29-Dec-2016.)

blocks.name: mptctf
blocks.content: A countable mapping set is countable, using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Mar-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm mptctf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cdom, com))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
} = {
  sylancr(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cdom, com), wfun(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), wbr(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cdom, com))
  funmpt(s0, c0, c1)
  mpancom(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wbr(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cdom, com), wbr(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cdom, c0))
  mpisyl(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wbr(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cdom, c0), wcel(c0, universe), wss(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), c0))
  ctex(c0)
  eqsstri(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), c0, crab(s0, c0, wcel(c1, universe)))
  dmmpt(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, c1)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  eqsstri(crab(s0, c0, wcel(c1, universe)), c0, cab(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, universe))))
  df-rab(s0, c0, wcel(c1, universe))
  sseqtri(cab(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, universe))), c0, cab(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  ss2abi(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, universe)), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  simpl(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, universe))
  abid2f(s0, c0)
  ssdomg(c0, universe, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)))
  domtr(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), c0, com)
  sylanb(wfun(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), wbr(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cdom, com), wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cdom, com), wfn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))))
  funfn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  fnct(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mptctf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0[‚âº]_om ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)[‚âº]_om)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c0)
} = {
  sylancr(c0[‚âº]_om, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)[‚âº]_om, Fun((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)), dom((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1))[‚âº]_om)
  funmpt(s0, c0, c1)
  mpancom(c0[‚âº]_om, dom((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1))[‚âº]_om, dom((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1))[‚âº]c0)
  mpisyl(c0[‚âº]_om, dom((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1))[‚âº]c0, c0 ‚àà ùïå, dom((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1))‚äÜ c0)
  ctex(c0)
  eqsstri(dom((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)), c0, { s0 ‚àà c0 | c1 ‚àà ùïå })
  dmmpt(s0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1), c0, c1)
  eqid((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1))
  eqsstri({ s0 ‚àà c0 | c1 ‚àà ùïå }, c0, { s0 |(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà ùïå)})
  df-rab(s0, c0, c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  sseqtri({ s0 |(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà ùïå)}, c0, { s0 | s0 ‚àà c0 })
  ss2abi(s0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà ùïå), s0 ‚àà c0)
  simpl(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  abid2f(s0, c0)
  ssdomg(c0, universe, dom((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)))
  domtr(dom((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)), c0, com)
  sylanb(Fun((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)), dom((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1))[‚âº]_om, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)[‚âº]_om, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)[Fn]dom((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)))
  funfn((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1))
  fnct((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1), dom((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)))
}

blocks.name: abrexctf
blocks.content: An image set of a countable set is countable, using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Mar-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm abrexctf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wbr(cab(s0, wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s0), c1))), cdom, com))
  -| wnfc(s1, c0)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl5eqbrr(cab(s0, wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s0), c1))), cdom, com, crn(cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), wbr(c0, cdom, com))
  rnmpt(s0, s1, cmpt(s1, c0, c1), c0, c1)
  eqid(cmpt(s1, c0, c1))
  syl(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wbr(crn(cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), cdom, com), wbr(cmpt(s1, c0, c1), cdom, com))
  mptctf(s1, c0, c1)
  rnct(cmpt(s1, c0, c1))
}

  rnmpt(s0, s1, (s1 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1), c0, c1)

blocks.name: cnvoprabOLD
blocks.content: The converse of a class abstraction of nested ordered pairs. Obsolete version of ~ cnvoprab as of 16-Oct-2022, which has nonfreeness hypotheses instead of disjoint variable conditions. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Aug-2017.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnvoprabOLD(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wceq(ccnv(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)), copab(s2, s3, w1))
  -| wnf(s0, w1)
  -| wnf(s1, w1)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s3), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wb(w1, w0))
  -| wi(w1, wcel(cv(s3), cxp(universe, universe)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsw(s3, w0)
} = {
  eqtr3i(ccnv(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)), copab(s2, s3, w1), ccnv(copab(s3, s2, w1)))
  cnveqi(copab(s3, s2, w1), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0))

thm cnvoprabOLD(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ `' { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 } = { < s2, s3 > | w1 }
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, w1)
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, w1)
  ‚ä£ (s3 = < s0, s1 > ‚Üí(w1 ‚Üî w0))
  ‚ä£ (w1 ‚Üí s3 ‚àà(ùïå √ó ùïå))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, w0)
} = {
  eqtr3i(`' { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 }, { < s2, s3 > | w1 }, `' { < s3, s2 > | w1 })
  cnveqi({ < s3, s2 > | w1 }, { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 })
  3eqtr4ri({ < s3, s2 > | w1 }, { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 }, { hs0 | ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1, ‚àÉ(s2,(hs0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 > ‚àß w0))))}, { hs0 | ‚àÉ(s3, ‚àÉ(s2,(hs0 = < s3, s2 > ‚àß w1)))})
  abbii(hs0, ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1, ‚àÉ(s2,(hs0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 > ‚àß w0)))), ‚àÉ(s3, ‚àÉ(s2,(hs0 = < s3, s2 > ‚àß w1))))
  3bitr2ri(‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1, ‚àÉ(s2,(hs0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 > ‚àß w0)))), ‚àÉ(s3, ‚àÉ(s2,(hs0 = < s3, s2 > ‚àß w1))), ‚àÉ(s2, ‚àÉ(s3,(hs0 = < s3, s2 > ‚àß w1))), ‚àÉ(s2, ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(hs0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 > ‚àß w0)))))
  excom(s3, s2, (hs0 = < s3, s2 > ‚àß w1))
  exbii(s2, ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(hs0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 > ‚àß w0))), ‚àÉ(s3,(hs0 = < s3, s2 > ‚àß w1)))
  impbii(‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(hs0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 > ‚àß w0))), ‚àÉ(s3,(hs0 = < s3, s2 > ‚àß w1)))
  exlimi(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(hs0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 > ‚àß w0)), ‚àÉ(s3,(hs0 = < s3, s2 > ‚àß w1)))
  nfex(s0, s3, (hs0 = < s3, s2 > ‚àß w1))
  exlimi(s1, (hs0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 > ‚àß w0), ‚àÉ(s3,(hs0 = < s3, s2 > ‚àß w1)))
  nfex(s1, s3, (hs0 = < s3, s2 > ‚àß w1))
  spcev(s3, < s0, s1 >, (hs0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 > ‚àß w0), (hs0 = < s3, s2 > ‚àß w1))
  opex(s0, s1)
  exlimiv(s3, (hs0 = < s3, s2 > ‚àß w1), ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(hs0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 > ‚àß w0))))
  mpcom((hs0 = < s3, s2 > ‚àß w1), ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(hs0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 > ‚àß w0))), s3 ‚àà(ùïå √ó ùïå))
  adantl(hs0 = < s3, s2 >, w1, s3 ‚àà(ùïå √ó ùïå))
  mpanr12(s3 ‚àà(ùïå √ó ùïå), ((hs0 = < s3, s2 > ‚àß w1)‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(hs0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 > ‚àß w0)))), (1st ` s3)‚àà ùïå, (2nd ` s3)‚àà ùïå)
  fvex(c1st, s3)
  fvex(c2nd, s3)
  spc2ed(s0, s1, (1st ` s3), universe, (2nd ` s3), universe, s3 ‚àà(ùïå √ó ùïå), (hs0 = < s3, s2 > ‚àß w1), (hs0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 > ‚àß w0))

  sylan2br(s3 ‚àà(ùïå √ó ùïå), (s0 =(1st ` s3)‚àß s1 =(2nd ` s3)), s3 = < s0, s1 >, ((1st ` s3)= s0 ‚àß(2nd ` s3)= s1))

  anbi12d(s3 = < s0, s1 >, hs0 = < s3, s2 >, w1, hs0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 >, w0)
  eqeq2d(hs0, < s3, s2 >, < < s0, s1 >, s2 >, s3 = < s0, s1 >)
  opeq1(s3, < s0, s1 >, s2)
  exrot3(s2, s0, s1, (hs0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 > ‚àß w0))
  df-oprab(s0, s1, s2, hs0, w0)
  df-opab(s3, s2, hs0, w1)
  cnvopab(s3, s2, w1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, < s3, s2 >)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)

  diff.cfv.s(s1, c2nd, s3)
  diff.c2nd.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, s3, (ùïå √ó ùïå))

blocks.name: f1od2
blocks.content: Sufficient condition for a binary function expressed in maps-to notation to be bijective. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Aug-2017.)

thm f1od2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wf1o(c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c3)), wa(wcel(c6, c7), wcel(c8, c9)))
  -| wi(w0, wb(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cv(s2), c4)), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c3), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c6), wceq(cv(s1), c8)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c8)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c8)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, wf1o(c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3), wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wfn(ccnv(c0), c3))
  syl(w0, wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c2, wcel(c4, c5))))
  ralrimivva(s0, s1, c1, c2, w0, wcel(c4, c5))
  fnmpt2(s0, s1, c1, c2, c4, c5, c0)
  mpbird(w0, wfn(ccnv(c0), c3), wfn(cmpt(s2, c3, cop(c6, c8)), c3))
  syl(w0, wfn(cmpt(s2, c3, cop(c6, c8)), c3), wral(s2, c3, wcel(cop(c6, c8), cxp(c7, c9))))
  ralrimiva(s2, c3, w0, wcel(cop(c6, c8), cxp(c7, c9)))
  fnmpt(s2, c3, cop(c6, c8), cxp(c7, c9), cmpt(s2, c3, cop(c6, c8)))
  eqid(cmpt(s2, c3, cop(c6, c8)))
  fneq1d(ccnv(c0), c3, cmpt(s2, c3, cop(c6, c8)), w0)
  3eqtr4g(ccnv(c0), cmpt(s2, c3, cop(c6, c8)), copab(s2, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c2)), wceq(cv(s2), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c4))))), copab(s2, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s2), c3), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c6, c8)))), w0)

blocks.name: fcobij
blocks.content: Composing functions with a bijection yields a bijection between sets of functions. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Aug-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm fcobij(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wf1o(cmpt(s0, co(c0, cmap, c1), ccom(c2, cv(s0))), co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c3, cmap, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wf1o(c2, c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c6))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  f1o2d(s0, hs0, cmpt(s0, co(c0, cmap, c1), ccom(c2, cv(s0))), co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c3, cmap, c1), ccom(c2, cv(s0)), ccom(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), w0)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, co(c0, cmap, c1), ccom(c2, cv(s0))))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cmap, c1))), wcel(ccom(c2, cv(s0)), co(c3, cmap, c1)), wf(ccom(c2, cv(s0)), c1, c3))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cmap, c1))), wf(ccom(c2, cv(s0)), c1, c3), wf(c2, c0, c3), wf(cv(s0), c1, c0))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cmap, c1)), wf(c2, c0, c3))
  syl(w0, wf(c2, c0, c3), wf1o(c2, c0, c3))
  f1of(c2, c0, c3)
  fco(c2, c0, c3, cv(s0), c1)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cmap, c1)), wb(wcel(ccom(c2, cv(s0)), co(c3, cmap, c1)), wf(ccom(c2, cv(s0)), c1, c3)))
  elmapd(ccom(c2, cv(s0)), c3, c1, c6, c4, w0)
  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, cmap, c1))), wcel(ccom(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), co(c0, cmap, c1)), wf(ccom(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c1, c0))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, cmap, c1))), wf(ccom(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c1, c0), wf(ccnv(c2), c3, c0), wf(cv(hs0), c1, c3))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, cmap, c1)), wf(ccnv(c2), c3, c0))
  3syl(w0, wf(ccnv(c2), c3, c0), wf1o(c2, c0, c3), wf1o(ccnv(c2), c3, c0))
  f1ocnv(c2, c0, c3)
  f1of(ccnv(c2), c3, c0)
  fco(ccnv(c2), c3, c0, cv(hs0), c1)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, cmap, c1)), wb(wcel(ccom(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), co(c0, cmap, c1)), wf(ccom(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c1, c0)))
  elmapd(ccom(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), c0, c1, c5, c4, w0)
  impbida(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cmap, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, cmap, c1)))), wceq(cv(s0), ccom(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs0), ccom(c2, cv(s0))))
  3eqtrrd(cv(hs0), ccom(c2, cv(s0)), ccom(ccom(c2, ccnv(c2)), cv(hs0)), ccom(cres(cid, c3), cv(hs0)), wa(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cmap, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, cmap, c1)))), wceq(cv(s0), ccom(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)))))
  syl6eqr(ccom(c2, cv(s0)), ccom(ccom(c2, ccnv(c2)), cv(hs0)), ccom(c2, ccom(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0))), wa(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cmap, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, cmap, c1)))), wceq(cv(s0), ccom(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)))))
  coeq2d(c2, cv(s0), ccom(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)), wa(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cmap, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, cmap, c1)))), wceq(cv(s0), ccom(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)))))
  simpr(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cmap, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, cmap, c1)))), wceq(cv(s0), ccom(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0))))
  coass(c2, ccnv(c2), cv(hs0))
  coeq1d(ccom(c2, ccnv(c2)), cv(hs0), cres(cid, c3), wa(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cmap, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, cmap, c1)))), wceq(cv(s0), ccom(ccnv(c2), cv(hs0)))))

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((s0 ‚àà(c0[‚Ü¶]c1)‚Ü¶(c2 ‚àò s0)):(c0[‚Ü¶]c1)‚Üî(c3[‚Ü¶]c1)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c2 : c0 ‚Üî c3))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c6)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)

  f1o2d(s0, hs0, (s0 ‚àà(c0[‚Ü¶]c1)‚Ü¶(c2 ‚àò s0)), (c0[‚Ü¶]c1), (c3[‚Ü¶]c1), (c2 ‚àò s0), (`' c2 ‚àò hs0), w0)
  eqid((s0 ‚àà(c0[‚Ü¶]c1)‚Ü¶(c2 ‚àò s0)))
  mpbird((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(c0[‚Ü¶]c1)), (c2 ‚àò s0)‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1), ((c2 ‚àò s0): c1 ‚Üí c3))
  syl2anc((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(c0[‚Ü¶]c1)), ((c2 ‚àò s0): c1 ‚Üí c3), (c2 : c0 ‚Üí c3), (s0 : c1 ‚Üí c0))
  adantr(w0, s0 ‚àà(c0[‚Ü¶]c1), (c2 : c0 ‚Üí c3))
  syl(w0, (c2 : c0 ‚Üí c3), (c2 : c0 ‚Üî c3))

  elmapd((c2 ‚àò s0), c3, c1, c6, c4, w0)
  mpbird((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1)), (`' c2 ‚àò hs0)‚àà(c0[‚Ü¶]c1), ((`' c2 ‚àò hs0): c1 ‚Üí c0))
  syl2anc((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1)), ((`' c2 ‚àò hs0): c1 ‚Üí c0), (`' c2 : c3 ‚Üí c0), (hs0 : c1 ‚Üí c3))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1), (`' c2 : c3 ‚Üí c0))
  3syl(w0, (`' c2 : c3 ‚Üí c0), (c2 : c0 ‚Üî c3), (`' c2 : c3 ‚Üî c0))
  f1ocnv(c2, c0, c3)

  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1), ((`' c2 ‚àò hs0)‚àà(c0[‚Ü¶]c1)‚Üî((`' c2 ‚àò hs0): c1 ‚Üí c0)))
  elmapd((`' c2 ‚àò hs0), c0, c1, c5, c4, w0)
  impbida((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà(c0[‚Ü¶]c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1))), s0 =(`' c2 ‚àò hs0), hs0 =(c2 ‚àò s0))
  3eqtrrd(hs0, (c2 ‚àò s0), ((c2 ‚àò `' c2)‚àò hs0), ((= |` c3)‚àò hs0), ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà(c0[‚Ü¶]c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1)))‚àß s0 =(`' c2 ‚àò hs0)))
  syl6eqr((c2 ‚àò s0), ((c2 ‚àò `' c2)‚àò hs0), (c2 ‚àò(`' c2 ‚àò hs0)), ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà(c0[‚Ü¶]c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1)))‚àß s0 =(`' c2 ‚àò hs0)))
  coeq2d(c2, s0, (`' c2 ‚àò hs0), ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà(c0[‚Ü¶]c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1)))‚àß s0 =(`' c2 ‚àò hs0)))

  coass(c2, `' c2, hs0)
  coeq1d((c2 ‚àò `' c2), hs0, (= |` c3), ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà(c0[‚Ü¶]c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1)))‚àß s0 =(`' c2 ‚àò hs0)))
  3syl(((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà(c0[‚Ü¶]c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1)))‚àß s0 =(`' c2 ‚àò hs0)), (c2 ‚àò `' c2)=(= |` c3), w0, (c2 : c0 ‚Üî c3))

  syl2anc(((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà(c0[‚Ü¶]c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1)))‚àß s0 =(`' c2 ‚àò hs0)), (hs0 : c1 ‚Üí c3), w0, hs0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1))
  simpll(w0, (s0 ‚àà(c0[‚Ü¶]c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1)), s0 =(`' c2 ‚àò hs0))
  simplrr(w0, s0 ‚àà(c0[‚Ü¶]c1), hs0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1), s0 =(`' c2 ‚àò hs0))
  biimpa(w0, hs0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1), (hs0 : c1 ‚Üí c3))
  elmapd(hs0, c3, c1, c6, c4, w0)
  fcoi2(hs0, c1, c3)
  3eqtrrd(s0, (`' c2 ‚àò hs0), ((`' c2 ‚àò c2)‚àò s0), ((= |` c0)‚àò s0), ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà(c0[‚Ü¶]c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1)))‚àß hs0 =(c2 ‚àò s0)))
  syl6eqr((`' c2 ‚àò hs0), ((`' c2 ‚àò c2)‚àò s0), (`' c2 ‚àò(c2 ‚àò s0)), ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà(c0[‚Ü¶]c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1)))‚àß hs0 =(c2 ‚àò s0)))
  coeq2d(`' c2, hs0, (c2 ‚àò s0), ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà(c0[‚Ü¶]c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1)))‚àß hs0 =(c2 ‚àò s0)))

  coass(`' c2, c2, s0)
  coeq1d((`' c2 ‚àò c2), s0, (= |` c0), ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà(c0[‚Ü¶]c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1)))‚àß hs0 =(c2 ‚àò s0)))
  3syl(((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà(c0[‚Ü¶]c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c1)))‚àß hs0 =(c2 ‚àò s0)), (`' c2 ‚àò c2)=(= |` c0), w0, (c2 : c0 ‚Üî c3))
  f1ococnv1(c2, c0, c3)

blocks.name: fcobijfs
blocks.content: Composing finitely supported functions with a bijection yields a bijection between sets of finitely supported functions. See also ~ mapfien . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Aug-2017.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Sep-2019.)

thm fcobijfs(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, class c10, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wf1o(cmpt(s0, c0, ccom(c1, cv(s0))), c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wf1o(c1, c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c8))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c9, c3))
  -| wceq(c10, cfv(c1, c9))
  -| wceq(c0, crab(s1, co(c3, cmap, c5), wbr(cv(s1), cfsupp, c9)))
  -| wceq(c2, crab(s2, co(c4, cmap, c5), wbr(cv(s2), cfsupp, c10)))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c10)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c9)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c9)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c10)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c9)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wf1o(cmpt(s0, c0, ccom(c1, cv(s0))), c0, c2)), diffsc(s0, c10))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wf1o(cmpt(s0, c0, ccom(c1, cv(s0))), c0, c2)), diffsc(s0, c3))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wf1o(cmpt(s0, c0, ccom(c1, cv(s0))), c0, c2)), diffsc(s0, c4))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wf1o(cmpt(s0, c0, ccom(c1, cv(s0))), c0, c2)), diffsc(s0, c9))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wf1o(cmpt(s0, c0, ccom(c1, cv(s0))), c0, c2)), diffsw(s2, w0))
  mpbid(w0, wf1o(cmpt(s0, c0, ccom(c1, cv(s0))), c0, c2), wf1o(cmpt(s0, c0, ccom(c1, ccom(cv(s0), cres(cid, c5)))), c0, c2))
  mapfien(s0, s2, c0, c1, cres(cid, c5), c2, c3, c5, c9, c4, c5, c10, w0)
  eqtr4i(c0, crab(s2, co(c3, cmap, c5), wbr(cv(s2), cfsupp, c9)), crab(s1, co(c3, cmap, c5), wbr(cv(s1), cfsupp, c9)))
  cbvrabv(s2, s1, co(c3, cmap, c5), wbr(cv(s2), cfsupp, c9), wbr(cv(s1), cfsupp, c9))
  breq1(cv(s2), cv(s1), cfsupp, c9)
  a1i(w0, wf1o(cres(cid, c5), c5, c5))
  f1oi(c5)
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, universe), wcel(c3, c7))
  elex(c3, c7)
  syl(w0, wcel(c5, universe), wcel(c5, c6))
  elex(c5, c6)
  syl(w0, wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c4, c8))
  elex(c4, c8)
  syl(w0, wb(wf1o(cmpt(s0, c0, ccom(c1, ccom(cv(s0), cres(cid, c5)))), c0, c2), wf1o(cmpt(s0, c0, ccom(c1, cv(s0))), c0, c2)), wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, ccom(c1, ccom(cv(s0), cres(cid, c5)))), cmpt(s0, c0, ccom(c1, cv(s0)))))
  mpteq2dva(s0, c0, ccom(c1, ccom(cv(s0), cres(cid, c5))), ccom(c1, cv(s0)), w0)
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(ccom(c1, ccom(cv(s0), cres(cid, c5))), ccom(c1, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, cmap, c5)))
  sseli(cv(s0), c0, co(c3, cmap, c5))
  eqsstri(c0, co(c3, cmap, c5), crab(s1, co(c3, cmap, c5), wbr(cv(s1), cfsupp, c9)))
  ssrab2(s1, co(c3, cmap, c5), wbr(cv(s1), cfsupp, c9))
  syl5eqr(ccom(c1, ccom(cv(s0), cres(cid, c5))), ccom(c1, cv(s0)), ccom(ccom(c1, cv(s0)), cres(cid, c5)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, cmap, c5))))
  coass(c1, cv(s0), cres(cid, c5))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, cmap, c5))), wceq(ccom(ccom(c1, cv(s0)), cres(cid, c5)), ccom(c1, cv(s0))), wf(ccom(c1, cv(s0)), c5, c4))
  syl2an(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, cmap, c5)), wf(ccom(c1, cv(s0)), c5, c4), wf(c1, c3, c4), wf(cv(s0), c5, c3))
  syl(w0, wf(c1, c3, c4), wf1o(c1, c3, c4))
  f1of(c1, c3, c4)
  elmapi(cv(s0), c3, c5)
  fco(c1, c3, c4, cv(s0), c5)
  fcoi1(ccom(c1, cv(s0)), c5, c4)
  f1oeq1(cmpt(s0, c0, ccom(c1, ccom(cv(s0), cres(cid, c5)))), cmpt(s0, c0, ccom(c1, cv(s0))), c0, c2)
  diff.cres.s(s0, cid, c5)
  diff.cid.s(s0)
  diff.cres.s(s2, cid, c5)
  diff.cid.s(s2)
  diff.co.s(s2, c3, cmap, c5)
  diff.cmap.s(s2)
  diff.co.s(s1, c3, cmap, c5)
  diff.cmap.s(s1)
  diff.wbr.s(s2, cv(s1), cfsupp, c9)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cfsupp.s(s2)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, cv(s2), cfsupp, c9)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.cfsupp.s(s1)
}

  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(c1 ‚àò s0)): c0 ‚Üî c2)), d(s2, w0))

  elex(c5, c6)

  syl(w0, (((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(c1 ‚àò(s0 ‚àò(= |` c5)))): c0 ‚Üî c2)‚Üî((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(c1 ‚àò s0)): c0 ‚Üî c2)), (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(c1 ‚àò(s0 ‚àò(= |` c5))))=(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(c1 ‚àò s0)))
  mpteq2dva(s0, c0, (c1 ‚àò(s0 ‚àò(= |` c5))), (c1 ‚àò s0), w0)

blocks.name: suppss3
blocks.content: Deduce a function's support's inclusion in another function's support. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Sep-2017.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Sep-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm suppss3(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(co(c0, csupp, c1), co(c2, csupp, c1)))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wfn(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c1)), wceq(c4, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl5eqss(co(c0, csupp, c1), co(c2, csupp, c1), co(cmpt(s0, c3, c4), csupp, c1), w0)
  oveq1i(c0, csupp, c1, cmpt(s0, c3, c4))
  suppss2(s0, c3, c4, c1, co(c2, csupp, c1), c5, w0)
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c3, co(c2, csupp, c1)))), wceq(c4, c1), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c1))
  simpl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c3, co(c2, csupp, c1))))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c3, co(c2, csupp, c1))), wcel(cv(s0), c3))
  eldifi(cv(s0), c3, co(c2, csupp, c1))
  imp(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c3, co(c2, csupp, c1))), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c1))
  3imtr4g(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c3, co(c2, csupp, c1))), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wn(wcel(cv(s0), co(c2, csupp, c1)))), wn(wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cdif(universe, csn(c1)))))
  expimpd(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3), wn(wcel(cv(s0), co(c2, csupp, c1))), wn(wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cdif(universe, csn(c1)))))
  biimpd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), co(c2, csupp, c1))), wn(wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cdif(universe, csn(c1)))))
  notbid(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c2, csupp, c1)), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cdif(universe, csn(c1))))
  baibd(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s0), co(c2, csupp, c1)), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cdif(universe, csn(c1))))
  bitrd(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c2, csupp, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cdif(universe, csn(c1)))), wcel(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(c2), cdif(universe, csn(c1)))))
  eleq2d(cv(s0), co(c2, csupp, c1), cima(ccnv(c2), cdif(universe, csn(c1))), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(c2, csupp, c1), cima(ccnv(c2), cdif(universe, csn(c1)))), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c1, c6))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(c2, universe), wfn(c2, c3), wcel(c3, c5))
  fnex(c2, c3, c5)
  suppimacnv(c2, universe, c1, c6)
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(c2), cdif(universe, csn(c1)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cdif(universe, csn(c1))))), wfn(c2, c3))
  elpreima(c2, c3, cv(s0), cdif(universe, csn(c1)))
  eldif(cv(s0), c3, co(c2, csupp, c1))
  necon2bbii(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c1, wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cdif(universe, csn(c1))))
  mpbiran(wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cdif(universe, csn(c1))), wne(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c1), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), universe))
  fvex(c2, cv(s0))
  eldifsn(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), universe, c1)
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, csupp, c1)
  diff.csupp.s(s0)
}

thm suppss3(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[supp]c1)‚äÜ(c2[supp]c1))
  ‚ä£ c0 =(s0 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶ c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2[Fn]c3)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß(c2 ` s0)= c1)‚Üí c4 = c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl5eqss((c0[supp]c1), (c2[supp]c1), ((s0 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶ c4)[supp]c1), w0)
  oveq1i(c0, csupp, c1, (s0 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶ c4))
  suppss2(s0, c3, c4, c1, (c2[supp]c1), c5, w0)
  syl3anc((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(c3 \(c2[supp]c1))), c4 = c1, w0, s0 ‚àà c3, (c2 ` s0)= c1)
  simpl(w0, s0 ‚àà(c3 \(c2[supp]c1)))
  adantl(w0, s0 ‚àà(c3 \(c2[supp]c1)), s0 ‚àà c3)
  eldifi(s0, c3, (c2[supp]c1))
  imp(w0, s0 ‚àà(c3 \(c2[supp]c1)), (c2 ` s0)= c1)
  3imtr4g(w0, s0 ‚àà(c3 \(c2[supp]c1)), (c2 ` s0)= c1, (s0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß ¬¨ s0 ‚àà(c2[supp]c1)), ¬¨(c2 ` s0)‚àà(ùïå \ { c1 }))
  expimpd(w0, s0 ‚àà c3, ¬¨ s0 ‚àà(c2[supp]c1), ¬¨(c2 ` s0)‚àà(ùïå \ { c1 }))
  biimpd((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c3), ¬¨ s0 ‚àà(c2[supp]c1), ¬¨(c2 ` s0)‚àà(ùïå \ { c1 }))
  notbid((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c3), s0 ‚àà(c2[supp]c1), (c2 ` s0)‚àà(ùïå \ { c1 }))
  baibd(w0, s0 ‚àà c3, s0 ‚àà(c2[supp]c1), (c2 ` s0)‚àà(ùïå \ { c1 }))
  bitrd(w0, s0 ‚àà(c2[supp]c1), (s0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß(c2 ` s0)‚àà(ùïå \ { c1 })), s0 ‚àà(`' c2 "(ùïå \ { c1 })))
  eleq2d(s0, (c2[supp]c1), (`' c2 "(ùïå \ { c1 })), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c2[supp]c1)=(`' c2 "(ùïå \ { c1 })), c2 ‚àà ùïå, c1 ‚àà c6)
  syl2anc(w0, c2 ‚àà ùïå, c2[Fn]c3, c3 ‚àà c5)
  fnex(c2, c3, c5)
  suppimacnv(c2, universe, c1, c6)
  syl(w0, (s0 ‚àà(`' c2 "(ùïå \ { c1 }))‚Üî(s0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß(c2 ` s0)‚àà(ùïå \ { c1 }))), c2[Fn]c3)
  elpreima(c2, c3, s0, (ùïå \ { c1 }))
  eldif(s0, c3, (c2[supp]c1))
  necon2bbii((c2 ` s0), c1, (c2 ` s0)‚àà(ùïå \ { c1 }))
  mpbiran((c2 ` s0)‚àà(ùïå \ { c1 }), (c2 ` s0)‚â† c1, (c2 ` s0)‚àà ùïå)
  fvex(c2, s0)
  eldifsn((c2 ` s0), universe, c1)
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, csupp, c1)
  diff.csupp.s(s0)
}

blocks.content: Finite support of a curried function with a constant first argument. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Jul-2023.)

thm fsuppcurry1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cfsupp, c1))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c2, co(c3, c4, cv(s0))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c8))
  -| wi(w0, wfn(c4, cxp(c6, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c4, cfsupp, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  syl32anc(w0, wbr(c0, cfsupp, c1), wcel(c0, universe), wfun(c0), wcel(c1, c5), wcel(cima(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe)), co(c4, csupp, c1)), cfn), wss(co(c0, csupp, c1), cima(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe)), co(c4, csupp, c1))))

  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cima(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe)), co(c4, csupp, c1)), cfn), wfun(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe))), wcel(co(c4, csupp, c1), cfn))
  mp1i(w0, wfun(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe))), wfun(c2nd))

  suppss(hs0, c0, c1, cima(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe)), co(c4, csupp, c1)), c2, universe, w0)
  fmptd(hs0, c0, c2, universe, co(c3, c4, cv(hs0)), w0)
  ovexd(c3, c4, cv(hs0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  eqtri(c0, cmpt(hs0, c2, co(c3, c4, cv(hs0))), cmpt(s0, c2, co(c3, c4, cv(s0))))
  cbvmptv(s0, hs0, c2, co(c3, c4, cv(s0)), co(c3, c4, cv(hs0)))
  sylan2b(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c2, cima(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe)), co(c4, csupp, c1)))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe)), co(c4, csupp, c1))))))
  eldif(cv(hs0), c2, cima(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe)), co(c4, csupp, c1)))
  impr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe)), co(c4, csupp, c1)))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1))
  con1d(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe)), co(c4, csupp, c1))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1))
  ex(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wn(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe)), co(c4, csupp, c1))))
  mpbird(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wn(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe)), co(c4, csupp, c1))), wrex(hs1, co(c4, csupp, c1), wceq(cfv(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe)), cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))))
  rspcedeq1vd(hs1, co(c4, csupp, c1), cfv(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe)), cv(hs1)), cv(hs0), cop(c3, cv(hs0)), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wn(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1))))

blocks.name: ffs2
blocks.content: Rewrite a function's support based with its range rather than the universal class. See also ~ frnsuppeq . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 27-Aug-2017.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Sep-2019.)

blocks.name: ffsrn
blocks.content: The range of a finitely supported function is finite. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 27-Aug-2017.)

blocks.name: maprnin
blocks.content: Restricting the range of the mapping operator. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Aug-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm maprnin(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(co(cin(c0, c1), cmap, c2), crab(s0, co(c0, cmap, c2), wss(crn(cv(s0)), c1)))
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(co(cin(c0, c1), cmap, c2), crab(s0, co(c0, cmap, c2), wss(crn(cv(s0)), c1)), cab(s0, wf(cv(s0), c2, cin(c0, c1))), cab(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cmap, c2)), wss(crn(cv(s0)), c1))))
  abbii(s0, wf(cv(s0), c2, cin(c0, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cmap, c2)), wss(crn(cv(s0)), c1)))
  3bitr4ri(wf(cv(s0), c2, cin(c0, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cmap, c2)), wss(crn(cv(s0)), c1)), wa(wf(cv(s0), c2, c0), wss(crn(cv(s0)), c1)), wa(wf(cv(s0), c2, c0), wf(cv(s0), c2, c1)))
  pm5.32i(wf(cv(s0), c2, c0), wss(crn(cv(s0)), c1), wf(cv(s0), c2, c1))
  syl(wf(cv(s0), c2, c0), wb(wss(crn(cv(s0)), c1), wf(cv(s0), c2, c1)), wfn(cv(s0), c2))
  ffn(cv(s0), c2, c0)
  baibr(wfn(cv(s0), c2), wss(crn(cv(s0)), c1), wf(cv(s0), c2, c1))
  df-f(cv(s0), c2, c1)
  anbi1i(wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cmap, c2)), wss(crn(cv(s0)), c1), wf(cv(s0), c2, c0))
  elmap(cv(s0), c0, c2)

  inex1(c0, c1)

}

blocks.name: fpwrelmapffslem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ fpwrelmapffs . For this theorem, the sets ` A ` and ` B ` could be infinite, but the relation ` R ` itself is finite. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Sep-2017.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Sep-2019.)

} = {
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà Fin ‚Üî(ran(c1)‚äÜ Fin ‚àß(c1[supp]‚àÖ)‚àà Fin))), c3 ‚àà ùïå)

  relopab(s0, s1, (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà(c1 ` s0)))

blocks.name: fpwrelmap
blocks.content: Define a canonical mapping between functions from ` A ` into subsets of ` B ` and the relations with domain ` A ` and range within ` B ` . Note that the same relation is used in ~ axdc2lem and ~ marypha2lem1 . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 28-Aug-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm fpwrelmap(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wf1o(c0, co(cpw(c1), cmap, c2), cpw(cxp(c2, c1)))
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, co(cpw(c1), cmap, c2), copab(s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  mptru(wf1o(c0, co(cpw(c1), cmap, c2), cpw(cxp(c2, c1))))
  f1od(s0, hs0, c0, co(cpw(c1), cmap, c2), cpw(cxp(c2, c1)), copab(s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), universe, cmpt(s1, c2, crab(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2)))), universe, wtru)
  adantl(wtru, wcel(cv(s0), co(cpw(c1), cmap, c2)), wcel(copab(s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), universe))
  opabex3d(s1, s2, c2, wcel(cv(s0), co(cpw(c1), cmap, c2)), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  a1i(wcel(cv(s0), co(cpw(c1), cmap, c2)), wcel(c2, universe))
  syl(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(cpw(c1), cmap, c2)), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wcel(cab(s2, wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), universe), wal(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s2), c1))))
  alrimiv(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(cpw(c1), cmap, c2)), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wi(wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s2), c1)))
  sylbir(wal(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), wcel(cab(s2, wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), universe), wss(cab(s2, wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), c1))
  abss(s2, c1, wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  ssex(cab(s2, wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), c1)
  a1i(wa(wtru, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cxp(c2, c1)))), wcel(cmpt(s1, c2, crab(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2)))), universe))
  mptex(s1, c2, crab(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2))))
  a1i(wtru, wb(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(cpw(c1), cmap, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), copab(s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cxp(c2, c1))), wceq(cv(s0), cmpt(s1, c2, crab(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2))))))))
  impbii(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(cpw(c1), cmap, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), copab(s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cxp(c2, c1))), wceq(cv(s0), cmpt(s1, c2, crab(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2)))))))
  jca(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(cpw(c1), cmap, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), copab(s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cxp(c2, c1))), wceq(cv(s0), cmpt(s1, c2, crab(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2))))))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(cpw(c1), cmap, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), copab(s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cxp(c2, c1))), wss(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, c1)))
  3sstr4d(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, c1), copab(s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), copab(s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(cpw(c1), cmap, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), copab(s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))))
  adantr(wcel(cv(s0), co(cpw(c1), cmap, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), copab(s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), wss(copab(s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), copab(s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), c1)))))
  ssopab2dv(s1, s2, wcel(cv(s0), co(cpw(c1), cmap, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), c1)))
  imdistanda(wcel(cv(s0), co(cpw(c1), cmap, c2)), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s2), c1))
  ex(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(cpw(c1), cmap, c2)), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s2), c1))

blocks.name: fpwrelmapffs
blocks.content: Define a canonical mapping between finite relations (finite subsets of a cartesian product) and functions with finite support into finite subsets. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 28-Aug-2017.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Sep-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm fpwrelmapffs(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wf1o(cres(c0, c1), c1, cin(cpw(cxp(c2, c3)), cfn))
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
  -| wcel(c3, universe)
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, co(cpw(c3), cmap, c2), copab(s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  -| wceq(c1, crab(s0, co(cin(cpw(c3), cfn), cmap, c2), wcel(co(cv(s0), csupp, emptycls), cfn)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
} = {
  mpbi(wf1o(cres(c0, c1), c1, cin(cpw(cxp(c2, c3)), cfn)), wf1o(cres(c0, crab(s0, co(cpw(c3), cmap, c2), wa(wss(crn(cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(co(cv(s0), csupp, emptycls), cfn)))), crab(s0, co(cpw(c3), cmap, c2), wa(wss(crn(cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(co(cv(s0), csupp, emptycls), cfn))), crab(hs0, cpw(cxp(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfn))))
  mptru(wf1o(cres(c0, crab(s0, co(cpw(c3), cmap, c2), wa(wss(crn(cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(co(cv(s0), csupp, emptycls), cfn)))), crab(s0, co(cpw(c3), cmap, c2), wa(wss(crn(cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(co(cv(s0), csupp, emptycls), cfn))), crab(hs0, cpw(cxp(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfn))))
  f1oresrab(s0, hs0, c0, co(cpw(c3), cmap, c2), cpw(cxp(c2, c3)), copab(s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wtru, wa(wss(crn(cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(co(cv(s0), csupp, emptycls), cfn)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfn))
  a1i(wtru, wf1o(c0, co(cpw(c3), cmap, c2), cpw(cxp(c2, c3))))
  fpwrelmap(s0, s1, s2, c0, c3, c2)
  3adant1(wtru, wcel(cv(s0), co(cpw(c3), cmap, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), copab(s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cfn), wa(wss(crn(cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(co(cv(s0), csupp, emptycls), cfn))))
  fpwrelmapffslem(s1, s2, cv(hs0), cv(s0), c2, c3, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(cpw(c3), cmap, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), copab(s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))))

  simpl(wcel(cv(s0), co(cpw(c3), cmap, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), copab(s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  elmap(cv(s0), cpw(c3), c2)
  simpr(wcel(cv(s0), co(cpw(c3), cmap, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), copab(s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  bitr2i(wf1o(cres(c0, crab(s0, co(cpw(c3), cmap, c2), wa(wss(crn(cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(co(cv(s0), csupp, emptycls), cfn)))), crab(s0, co(cpw(c3), cmap, c2), wa(wss(crn(cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(co(cv(s0), csupp, emptycls), cfn))), crab(hs0, cpw(cxp(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfn))), wf1o(cres(c0, c1), c1, cin(cpw(cxp(c2, c3)), cfn)), wf1o(cres(c0, c1), crab(s0, co(cpw(c3), cmap, c2), wa(wss(crn(cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(co(cv(s0), csupp, emptycls), cfn))), crab(hs0, cpw(cxp(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfn))))
  mp2an(wb(wf1o(cres(c0, c1), c1, cin(cpw(cxp(c2, c3)), cfn)), wf1o(cres(c0, c1), crab(s0, co(cpw(c3), cmap, c2), wa(wss(crn(cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(co(cv(s0), csupp, emptycls), cfn))), crab(hs0, cpw(cxp(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfn)))), wceq(c1, crab(s0, co(cpw(c3), cmap, c2), wa(wss(crn(cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(co(cv(s0), csupp, emptycls), cfn)))), wceq(cin(cpw(cxp(c2, c3)), cfn), crab(hs0, cpw(cxp(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfn))))
